mapper.select: select sum(drop_coins) as 'goldCoin',sum(drop_red_envelope) as 'redEnvelopes' from tb_land_seed a,tb_seeds_fall b where a.id=b.id and a.user_id=#{userId}
select b.id,b.drop_coins,b.drop_red_envelope,b.drop_falling_flowers from tb_land_seed a,tb_seeds_fall b where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.id=b.id
select a.user_id,b.seed_prodred from tb_land_seed a,tb_seed b where a.seed_id=b.seed_id and a.new_seed_is=1
